text: The ikurri単a or flag of Basque Country () is colored red and the coat of arms in the center, was adopted a smooth white cross and a Saint George' green cross. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of the center. The ratio of the flag is 2:3. ==References== Ikurri単a Category:Basque Country Ikurri単a
title: Ikurri単a
